alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson and southwestern Madison Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Monticello, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flood impacts including roadway ponding are expected. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Lamont, Aucilla, Eridu and Sirmans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
